text.div:
The EHR Server supports the following transactions for the resource Person: read, vread, update, history, search(name,gender), create and updates.

The EHR System supports the following message: admin-notify::Person.

The EHR Application has a general document profile.

value.name: ACME-EHR
value.title: ACME EHR capability statement
value.description: This is the FHIR capability statement for the main EHR at ACME for the private interface - it does not describe the public interface

xml-example.value:
The EHR Server supports the following transactions for the resource Person: read, vread, update, history, search(name,gender), create and updates.

The EHR System supports the following message: admin-notify::Person.

The EHR Application has a general document profile.

curl --location --request POST 'http://burni.example.com/fhir/TerminologyCapabilities \' 
--header 'Content-Type: application/fhir+json' \
--data-raw '{"resourceType":"TerminologyCapabilities","id":"41629280-2bbb-4a35-bef4-3b26fb706a20","url":"urn:uuid:68D043B5-9ECF-4559-A57A-396E0D452311","version":"20130510","name":"ACME-EHR","title":"ACME EHR capability statement","status":"draft","experimental":true,"date":"2012-01-04T08:00:00+08:00","publisher":"ACME Corporation","contact":[{"name":"System Administrator","telecom":[{"system":"email","value":"wile@acme.org"}]}],"description":"This is the FHIR capability statement for the main EHR at ACME for the private interface - it does not describe the public interface","kind":"instance","software":{"name":"TxServer","version":"0.1.2"},"implementation":{"description":"Acme Terminology Server","url":"http://example.org/tx"},"codeSearch":"explicit","meta":{"versionId":"1","lastUpdated":"2022-02-13T22:30:19.937+08:00"}}'
